title: Cassiopeia SO OP as top and mid
body: I personally reckon shes so op as in lane bullying and teamfights, even 1v2 or 3s. Check out my CASS video!

replies.body: Vs'd an obvious Cass Scripter last night.
THis is nothing new, but the change cut her power in half, RIP old Cassio.
I dont think its cutting her power in half but more like changing her playing style. Although her Q isnt as good as before, her E however is a machine gun, as shown in my video.

I can't see this as more than average tbh.. there's just a complete lack of kiting in this video, which is quite a basic necessity when playing most champions, especially Cass. 
For example: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R0fI91GZluY 
(isn't my video, i just typed cassiopeia kiting) 
Or this one of Voyboy,
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CKEMksZYEUI
I can see alot of improvement coming though :)
seems like only yesterday that she was the worst champ in league
SSHHHHH Keep it on the down low. What do you think I'm abusing in ranked. Oh and for the most part nice vid! :)
